successes.title: Hex: A copter that anyone can fly!
successes.description: Hex is the world's first personalized smartphone controlled nanocopter that lets you see the world from a different perspective.

Pledges.description: Hex stickers and buttons! Receive 4 stickers and 2 buttons as an appreciation for your support!
Early backers! Thanks for your support! Receive a basic set (quadcopter), a standard shell and a spare propellers set.
Hex Carrier set!  Receive a basic set (quadcopter), a standard shell and a spare propellers set.
Hex Hexacopter Set! Thanks for your support! Receive a basic (hexacopter) set, with a standard hexacopter shell and a spare propellers set.
Hex Competitive Set! Receive two different customized 3D printed shells and basic set (quadcopter). You will also receive two spare propellers set and two spare motor sets.
Hex Aerial Photographer set! Receive a basic set (hexacopter), an aerial photographer shell, a Wi-Fi webcam module and a spare propellers set.
Hex Combo Set!  Receive one hexacopter set with Aerial Photographer shell and WiFi webcam module PLUS one basic quadcopter set.  Each copter comes with spare propellers and spare motors.
Hex Crazy-Flying Set! Receive one hexacopter and four different customized quadcopters so you can race, battle and do all the tricks! You will also receive five spare propellers and motor sets.
Hex Spy Set! Receive a basic set (quadcopter), a 5.8G video transmitter module, a pair of 5.8G first person view glasses and a spare propellers set.

Beta Testers! We will specially design a hexacopter (with video transmitter and FPV glasses) and a quadcopter for you! In addition you will join an exclusive group of beta testers for our improvements and other drone products!  We will seek your feedback for improvement
Epic Hex backer! You are the most epic person ever, and we would love to talk to you in person; coffee and dinner on us!
